sections.description: Professional address management system with interactive Google Maps location selection, multi-zone shipping, and delivery scheduling for WooCommerce.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/
2. Activate through WordPress Plugins menu
3. Configure Google Maps API key
4. Set up delivery zones in WooCommerce settings
sections.changelog:
3.1.1

  • Added delivery scheduling system per zone
  • Implemented zone-based delivery times configuration
  • Fixed location saving in guest checkout
  • Enhanced REST API with delivery schedule endpoints
  • Improved order admin display with schedule information
  • Added automatic shipping recalculation on zone change

3.0.6

  • Complete REST API implementation
  • Order creation via API support
  • Enhanced admin order display
  • Auto-sync addresses to orders
  • Guest checkout improvements

2.5.0

  • Multi-zone shipping system
  • Dynamic shipping cost calculation
  • Admin zones management page
  • Arabic language support for zones
sections.faq:
Does it work with guest checkout?

Yes, fully supports guest checkout with all features.

Can I use custom Google Maps API key?

Yes, you can configure your own API key in the plugin file.

Does it sync addresses automatically?

Yes, when users update saved addresses, pending/processing orders are updated automatically.
